trends: There has been one other sighting in Colonial Heights
There were no other sightings in Colonial Heights on or around February 18th 2006
Summary: size 100 ft. x8-10 ft.,speed 15mph, low pitch hum sound, height 40 ft.
divs: sighting detailsi was on front porch my house on feb.18,2006 at 8:10 pm,i saw a triangle ship across street from me appox.40-45 ft. above ground,size 100 ft.color black,no windows or opening,speed very slow 15-20 mph-so low only in sight 1-2 min.-sound a low pitch hum.lights on bottom did not count,8-10 appox.-size were about size of old seal beam car head-light,color amber. the base of triangle in front,the point in rear.wasso close i could have hit with a sling shot.direction 60 degree mag.-course would have taken ..ship over a military base,fort lee ,virginia.what did i think ?over the years i have seen many lights in the night sky,and were not aircraft ,not of this world. i wrote this down,notes on feb.18,2006 waverly 2\@
